fields.name: team_groupings
fields.description: List teams in smaller conceptual groupings

fields.name: breadcrumbs
fields.description: When enabled, show breadcrumbs, a navigational tool to show position in the site map. When disabled, do not show breadcrumbs, but instead show a page title in a header tag.

fields.name: cms_content
fields.description: When enabled, show content management system pages.  When disabled, show a note indicating that the site is not ready to unveil to the public.
